SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM pact_main p INNER JOIN wf_process_instance pi ON p.process_instance_id = pi.instance_id INNER JOIN wf_process_task pt ON pi.instance_id = pt.process_instance_id WHERE pt.assignee_user_id = #{userId} AND pt.task_status = 'PENDING' AND p.status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY p.create_time DESC
